name: Combination Strike
desc: You strike out with a one-two punch, flexibly adapting your assault to the field.
effect: Make 1 _Major Attack_ and 1 _Minor Attack_.
special: Gain 1 _Temporary_ _Momentum_ that may only be used for _Attacks_ and _Gambits_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Replace a _Minor Attack_ with a _Major Attack_.

name: Butterfly Road
desc: You move with fluid grace, slipping past foes in an elegant dance.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. Attacks against you take a -2 _Penalty_ this _Turn_. At the end of your first _Move_ inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1. At the end of the second, inflict _Exposed_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1. At the end of the third, inflict _Reeling_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1. You must move at least one space during each Move this turn.
special: Any creature that uses a Reaction on you triggered by you creating an _Opening_ due to starting Movement gains _Impaired_ 1.

name: Call the Pack
desc: You command your allies with practiced precision, coordinating a Synchronized Assault.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_, then choose two allies. They gain a _Free Turn_ that they may use to _Step_ towards the target of your Attack and make a _Minor Attack_ against the same creature as you. If all three Attacks _Graze_+, inflict _Reeling_ 1, or _Reeling_ 2 on a _Hit_+.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, your ally makes a _Major Attack_ on the _Free Turn_. Your ally may contribute to this _Boost_. You may use this _Boost_ any number of times.

name: Flashing Fangs
desc: You become a tightly-wound spring, ready to lunge out at the first foe foolish enough to enter your range.
effect: Choose a _Melee_ _Major Attack_. Create a _Burst_ X _Hazard_ and become _Charging_, where X is your _Step_ distance + the _Reach_ of the Attack. Whenever you end a _Phase_ while _Charging_ (excluding the initial _Phase_ where this Technique was used), increase the size of the _Hazard_ by 1, up to your _Reposition_ distance. Whenever a creature ends their _Turn_ in the _Hazard_ or enters it you may immediately end _Charging_. You may _Reposition_ towards them, then make a _Major Attack_ against them with _Advantage_. When calculating _Speed Penalties_, add the number of _Phases_ you were charging to the current _Phase_.
boost: 1 _AP_: After removing the _Hazard_ and making this Attack, repeat the _Effect_.

name: Dance of a Thousand Stings
desc: You dart across the battlefield, unleashing a serious of swift strikes.
effect: After each Movement, make a _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attack_. Any Attacks you make this _Turn_ cause the Targets to treat your remaining Movement this _Turn_ as [_Safe_] on a _Hit_+.
special:
If all three Attacks target unique creatures choose one:
* The third Attack may be a _Light_/_Versatile_ _Major Attack_.
* Gain 2 _Momentum_.

name: Deep Freeze
desc: You rapidly drop the temperature around a foe, attempting to freeze them solid.
effect:
Choose a Size 1 or smaller creature within Range. _Draw_ 1 and make their space _Frozen_, then _Draw_ 1 from all spaces adjacent to the Target and make them _Frozen_. Deal 2 _Cold_ Damage to the target and inflict _Frigid_ 2, _Hobbled_ 1. You may purchase up to X value of additional effects, where X is the number of spaces adjacent to the target that are _Frozen_. You may purchase all options multiple times:
* 1: Deal +1 _Cold_ Damage.
* 1: Increase the _Frigid_ inflicted by 1.
* 2: Increase the _Hobbled_ inflicted by 1.
* 3: Add _Restrained_ [2 _Stamina_]. If you purchase this option again, increase the cost to Negate by 2.
special: If this effect inflicts _Restrained_, the effect automatically ends if there are no _Frozen_ spaces adjacent to the Target. Otherwise, while _Recovering_, the creature may spend 2 _Stamina_ and take 2 _Cold_ Damage to end the effect.
boost:
Choose one:
* 2 _Momentum_: You may target a Size 2 creature. _Draw_ 3, and make all the spaces they occupy _Frozen_.
* 4 _Momentum_: You may target a Size 3 creature. _Draw_ 7, and make all the spaces they occupy _Frozen_.

name: Downhill Rush
desc: You glide forward on a sheet of ice, accelerating across the battlefield.
effect:
Gain 8 Skate Points, which may be spent for various effects this Turn:
* You may spend 1 Skate Point to _Draw_ 1 within Range 3 and make an adjacent space _Frozen_.
* You may spend 0 Skate Points to _Draw_ 1 from a _Watersource_ as your enter it to make it _Frozen_. Do not resolve any effects from entering the _Watersource_ space. You may use this option as many times as you wish.
* You may spend 2 Skate Points to use _Flying Snow_ at no Cost and ignoring its _Taxing_. You may use this option twice.
* Spend X (maximum 3) Skate Point to inflict _Frigid_ X and deal X _Cold_ Damage to an adjacent creature.
* At the end of a Move, you may choose one of the following options:
	* You may spend 4 Skate Points to inflict _Frigid_ 1 and deal 2 _Cold_ Damage in a _Cone_ 2.
	* You may spend 8 Skate Points to inflict _Frigid_ 1 and deal 3 _Cold_ Damage in a _Cone_ 3.

Lose any unspent Skate Points at the end of the _Turn_.
special: All Movement this _Turn_ on a _Frozen_ space is [_Safe_]. Additionally, gain [_Frostwalk_] this _Turn_ or, if you already have [_Frostwalk_], gain 2 more Skate Points.
boost:
X _Momentum_ (max 5): Gain an additional X Skate Points.
Choose one:
* 1 _Momentum_: Remove [_Rush_].
* 2 _Momentum_: Instead, Move is _Reposition_ [_Rush_], _Reposition_ [_Rush_].

name: Eager Spires
desc: You seize the earth within an area, causing vicious jagged bursts of sharp stone to erupt unpredictably.
effect: Create a _Blast_ 1 _Hazard_ within Range. At the end of each _Phase_ (excluding this one), choose an _Earthen_ space within the _Hazard_. Apply the _Jagged_ effect to the creature in that space, then make the space _Jagged_. If the space was already _Jagged_, instead apply the effect twice.
special: You may not trigger the effect at the end of a _Phase_ more than 5 times.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, create a _Blast_ 2 _Hazard_. When you create the _Hazard_, immediately trigger the end of _Phase_ effect twice. You must choose two different spaces.

name: Ebb and Flow
desc: You send water whipping back and forth, creating a tide that pulls foes in and out.
effect:
_Draw_ 3, then use _Roiling Tide_ three times at no Cost and without the need to _Draw_, with the following rules.
* <u>First Attack:</u> Resolve this Attack as normal. If you use _Roiling Tide_'s _Boost_, choose any _Source_ you initially _Drew_ from.
* <u>Second Attack:</u> This Attack must inflict the opposite of _Push_/_Pull_ that the previous Attack did and may not target the previous Target. Apply _Roiling Tide_'s _Boost_ at no Cost, but it must originate from the previous Target's space, as if you _Drew_ from it.
* <u>Final Attack</u>: This Attack follows all the rules of the second Attack. Additionally, it is instead a _Cone_ 2 Area. Create X _Wet_ spaces in the _Area_ after the Attack, where X is (the number of spaces you _Drew_ from)-(the number of targets you inflicted _Soaked_ on).

Only inflict _Soaked_ with the Final Attack.
special: No Target may be more than 8 spaces from you during this Technique.
boost: 4 _Momentum_: Instead, _Draw_ 6. Prior to making the Final Attack, make another Attack following the same rules as the second. The Final Attack instead has a _Cone_ 3 Area. For every 2 _Phases_ after Phase 3 this Technique is played, reduce the Cost of this _Boost_ by 1.

name: Eyes of Greed
desc: You carefully scan the battlefield, finding opportunities for allies wherever you look.
effect:
Place 4 Weapons within Range, following the below constraints:
* You may place these anywhere within _Range_, but may not place them adjacent to yourself or allies or within 3 spaces of another _Improvised Weapons_ placed by this effect.
* The Weapon is a _Small Improvised_/_Medium Improvised_ Weapon, made of the same material as the _Base_ _Terrain_ or an adjacent _Obstacle_. It deals your choice of _Crush_, _Slash_, or _Stab_ damage.
special: All Weapons placed by this have [_Fragile_, _Opportune_] and, upon being _Wielded_, grant the wielder 1 _Temporary_ _Momentum_. Only you and your allies may use these Weapons.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may choose _Natural_, _Wood_, or _Metal_ as the Material of placed weapons, ignoring the Terrain.

name: Artillery Flame
desc: A long-range detonation of flame that destroys all before it.
effect: Attack with the below Profile.
boost: 4 _Momentum_: Instead, _Area_ is _Blast_ 2.

name: Flash Fire
desc: You create a field of flames, making it impossible for foes to move.
effect: Create 4 _Blazing_ spaces within Range. At the end of the next 3 _Phases_, you may choose 2 _Blazing_ spaces within _Range_ and within 4 spaces of each other. Connect those spaces with a _Line_ of _Blazing_ spaces and immediately resolve the _Blazing_ effect as if the creature ended their _Turn_ there.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may use this _Boost_ whenever you place a _Blazing_ space with this _Technique_. Inflict _Alight_ 1 on the creature in this space.

name: Guide the Flock
desc: You find a path forward for your allies, providing them a great deal of mobility.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. All allies within Range gain a _Free Turn_ where they may _Reposition_. Enemies adjacent to you treat all allied Movement on these _Free Turns_ as [_Safe_].
special: As a part of this Technique, designate a _Blast_ 1 within _Range_. Any ally that ends their _Free Turn_ in this Area gains 1 _Momentum_.

name: Isolating Manuever
desc: You engage a foe in single combat, limiting their ability to engage your allies.
effect:
Make a _Melee_ _Major Attack_, adding _Marked_ and _Slide_ 3. Immediately after inflicting the _Slide_, you must Move 3 in the same direction. If neither you nor the target have a creature adjacent to you and you are adjacent to the Target, you become _Marked_ by the target. While you are _Marked_ by one another:
* Neither of you may inflict _Marked_ on other creatures and immediately end all other _Marked_ effects.
* You and the Target have _Disadvantage_ on all attacks against other creatures.

This effect ends when you or the target is _Defeated_ or they _Recover_ while not adjacent to you and expend 4 _Stamina_. If this effect ends, immediately remove both _Marked_.

name: Lion's Roar
desc: You loudly charge forth into battle, making your intentions clear.
effect: Gain 4 _Health_ and make a _Major Attack_. Immediately after resolving the Attack grant _Courageous_ 1 allies of your choice in a _Burst_ 2, or _Courageous_ 2 if you _Crit_ or _Defeated_ a foe.
special: Any ally that received _Courageous_ gains a _Free Turn_ where they may Move 1 towards you.

name: Ocean's Veil
desc: You pull forth water to create a great wall, warding your allies from assault.
effect: Gain 2 _Momentum_, then _Draw_ up to 4 within _Range_. Choose X contiguous spaces within _Range_, where X is amount you _Drew_. Inflict _Soaked_ 1, _Slide_ 1 on all creatures in these spaces, then create a _Water Veil_ in each space. You must _Slide_ these creatures into a space that is not targeted by this Technique. While these _Water Veil_s persist treat your _Reeling_ as 2 lower and you do not need to _Draw_ when using _Shielding Wave_ if the Attack passes through them. You may not use the _Boost_ if you use this option.
special: You may add [_Enchant_]; if you do, remove [_Fleeting_] from these _Water Veil_s.

name: Overwatch
desc: You take a position with a pristine view, preparing to lay down supporting fire for allies.
effect: Resolve your Move, inflict _Studied_ 1 on all creatures of your choice in the _Area_, then draw a _Hazard_ there. Until you leave this space or the end of the _Round_, you may trigger _Opportunity Attack_ whenever a creature within this _Hazard_ creates an _Opening_, regardless of _Reach_. _Opportunity Attack_s triggered in this way may use _Ranged_ Attacks.
special: You may reduce the Area to Cone to 9, 6, or 3; if you do, you may inflict an additional 1/2/4 _Studied_, distributed among creatures in the _Area_ as you wish.

name: Hunter's Shot
desc: You carefully line up an attack, waiting for the opportune moment to release it.
effect: Choose a creature within Range and inflict _Studied_ 1 on them, then choose a _Major Attack_ and becoming _Charging_. If it's a _Weapon Attack_, that _Weapon_ becomes _Occupied_. At the end of any _Turn_ or _Phase_ you may make choose to stop _Charging_ and unleash the _Attack_ on the target creature. _At the end of each _Phase_ you do not make this Attack (not including the _Phase_ where you began the effect) inflict _Studied_ 1 on that creature.
special: When you resolve this _Attack_, replace one dice roll with X, where X is the number of _Phases_ you have been _Charging_ (maximum 6).

name: Raging Stampede
desc: You let out a mighty bellow before you unleash a series of devastating attacks.
effect: Resolve your Move, then make a _Charged Attack_, adding [_Glancing_]. After resolving the _Charged Attack_, immediately make another _Charged Attack_, adding [_Glancing_].
special: You must use a _Heavy_ _Major Attack_ for this.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Treat the current _Phase_ as one later when resolving a _Charged Attack_. You may use this _Boost_ multiple times, applying it to a different _Charged Attack_ each time.
* 1 _Momentum_: You may instead use a _Versatile_ _Major Attack_. You must pay this _Boost_ for each _Charged Attack_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Immediately after resolving the second _Charged Attack_, make another _Charged Attack_, adding [_Glancing_].
* 2 _Momentum_/1 _AP_ (paid after making a _Charged Attack_): Take a _Free Turn_ where you may _Step_ before making your next _Charged Attack_.

name: Roiling Earth
desc: A minor earthquake, firing earth upward and testing the footing of all involved.
effect: Attack all Targets in the Area with this Technique's Profile. Any _Prone_ creatures in the _Area_ take +3 Damage. _Earthen_ Terrain in the _Area_ is _Uneven Earth_ until the end of the next _Phase_.
boost: 1 _AP_: After resolving this Attack, create a _Hazard_ in the Area. At the end of the _Round_, resolve this Attack once again and remove the _Hazard_. While the _Hazard_ persists, treat all _Earthen_ Terrain in the _Area_ as _Uneven Earth_.

analysis_notes.notes: Small fudge in case of Prone creatures.

name: Ruinous Bolt
desc: You unleash a blinding bolt of lighting, searing across the landscape.
effect: Create a _Hazard_ in the _Area_ and become _Charging_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove the _Hazard_ and resolve the below Attack against all _Targets_.
boost:
Choose one:
* 2 _Momentum_: Instead, resolve the Attack instantly without _Charging_.
* 4 _Momentum_: Instead, _Area_ is _Wide Line_ 8x3.

name: Safe Haven
desc: You adopt a defensive stance and prepare to offer you guard to your allies.
effect:
Gain the following benefits until the end of the _Round_:
* Whenever you use a _Reaction_ on an ally treat your _Reeling_ value as half its current value.
* You may allow adjacent allies to use your _Stamina_.
* Each _Turn_ you gain 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_.
* Once before the end of the _Round_ as a _Reaction_ you and an adjacent ally may _Recover_, reduce _Reeling_ by 1, and gain 3 _Health_.
special: If an Attack targeting an ally passes through a space adjacent to you may pay 1 _Momentum_. If you do, the ally may use your _Stamina_ against the triggering Attack and you may use the _Intercept_ Reaction (paying its cost as normal) as if your ally was adjacent.

name: Scouring Flames
desc: A sudden, violent, and all-consuming flame that devours all in its path.
effect: Attack with the below Profile. After resolving the Attack, inflict _Alight_ 1 on a creature in the _Area_ or create a _Blazing_ space. Repeat this secondary effect four times.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Momentum_: Area is instead _Cone_ 4.
* 5 _Momentum_: Area is instead _Cone_ 5.
* 1 _Momentum_: Resolve the after Attack effect another time. You may use this _Boost_ up to 3 times.

name: Skulk
desc: You conceal yourself before sliding across the battlefield, avoiding the notice of foes.
effect: Gain 2 _Momentum_ and _Stealthy_. You are treated as if you are in a _Veiled_ space this _Turn_ and may not remove _Stealthy_ by any means.
special: If you use _Ambush_ this _Round_ you may either make a _Light_/_Versatile_ _Major Attack_ instead of a _Minor Attack_ or make an additional _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attack_.

name: Song of Victory
desc: You encourage your allies, helping them to find the strength to push forward.
effect:
Grant yourself _Courageous_/_Joyful_ 1 then gain 5 Song Points. You may spend 1 Song Point to grant an ally within Range _Courageous_/_Joyful_ 1. You may use this option any number of times. Additionally, you may purchase the following options, but no more than once per Target:
* 1 Song Points: The target gains a _Free Turn_ with _Step_ _Movement_.
* 2 Song Points: The target gains a _Free Turn_ where they may make a _Minor Attack_.

 
Any ally that you target with any effect gains 2 _Vigor_. Lose any unspent Song Points at the end of the _Turn_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Gain an additional Song Point. You may use this _Boost_ up to 4 times.

name: Stone Edge
desc: You tear forth a slab of earth, flinging it with horrific force.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, create a _Boulder_ as a part of this _Technique_. There must be at least one _Earthen_ space within _Range_ to use this _Boost_.

name: Stone Lord
desc: You forge a suit of stone around yourself, becoming an unstoppable behemoth.
effect:
_Destroy_ the Obstacle and gain Stone Armor. While this _Enchant_ persists, gain the following effects:
* Gain a special Armor with no weight that grants _Resistance_ 2 [All but _Crush_] and has a _Durability_ of 9. You benefit from this Armor and any other Armor you are currently wearing.
* Treat yourself as one Size larger for all Effects.
* Gain _Resilience_ 2 (_Forced Movement_)
* Allies may treat you as an Obstacle with a _Height_ of 1 when determining _Cover_/_Obscured_.
* You become an _Earth_ Source.
* Whenever you Move add [_Rush_] and you Move 1 less spaces than you normally would.

If you lose the _Guard_ provided by the Stone Armor, end this _Enchant_.
special:
If you repeat this _Technique_ while you have Stone Armor, gain the following effects while you have Stone Armor:
* You become _Size_ 2, and when applicable are a _Height_ 2 Obstacle.
* Reset the _Guard_ provided by your Stone Armor and increase it to 3.
* Gain _Tough_ and 5 _Vigor_.

name: Smash
desc: You sacrifice speed for absolute power, unleashing a singular devastating strike.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make a _Heavy_ _Major Attack_, adding [_Pierce_ 1] and dealing additional _Bonus Damage_ equal to half the _Phase_ on a _Graze_+.
* Resolve your _Movement_, then make a _Charged Attack_. You must use a _Heavy_ _Major Attack_ for this.
special: All Attacks treat their _Speed_ as 1 higher this _Turn_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: You may make a _Versatile_ _Major Attack_ rather than a _Heavy_.
* 2 _Momentum_: If you select the _Charged Attack_ option add [_Unblockable_, _Overwhelming_ 1] and deal +1 _Bonus Damage_ on a _Graze_+. Remove the _Charging_ and _Hazard_ from said _Charged Attack_ 1 _Phase_ later.

name: Skirmish
desc: You move quickly, unleashing a flurry of light attacks as your stride across the field.
effect: Make 3 _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attacks_.
special: All _Light_ Attacks treat their _Speed_ as 1 lower this _Turn_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, all _Light_/_Versatile_ Attacks treat their _Speed_ as 1 lower this _Turn_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Choose one: 
	* Make one additional _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attack_.
	* Replace a _Minor Attack_ with a _Major Attack_.

name: Torching Flare
desc: You cultivate a flame, focusing the heat into a single point more and more as time passes.
effect:
Create the 1st _Hazard_, then become _Charging_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove the _Hazard_ and stop _Charging_ and either resolve the below Attack or create the next _Hazard_, as outlined below.
* **1st Hazard**: Create an _Arc_ 3 _Hazard_.
* **2nd Hazard**: Create a _Cone_ 3 _Hazard_. When you resolve the Attack, deal +1 Damage and add _Alight_ 1.
* **3rd Hazard**: Create a _Line_ 6 _Hazard_. When you resolve the Attack, deal +2 Damage, add _Alight_ 2, and [_Pierce_ 1].
* **4th Hazard**: Create a _Line_ 3 _Hazard_. When you resolve the Attack, deal +5 Damage, add _Alight_ 3, _Burned_ 1, and [_Pierce_ 2].
* **5th Hazard**: Create a single space _Hazard_ in an adjacent space. When you resolve the Attack, deal +8 Damage, add _Alight_ 4, _Burned_ 2, and [_Pierce_ 3].
special: When you create your _Hazard_, choose an adjacent space. All future _Hazards_ created by this _Technique_ must be centered on this space. If you are moved, use the equivalent adjacent space.

name: Thunderstorm
desc: You form a volatile cloud crackling with lighting, using it to cause devastation from afar.
effect:
Create a _Blast_ 1 _Hazard_ within Range. At the end of the next _Phase_ create a Thundercloud in the Area. While the _Enchant_ persists you may originate any _Storm_ Attack from the Thundercloud instead of yourself so long as you are within Range 12 of it. When you do so, add the following effects:
* Attacks may only Target creatures in the Thundercloud, but add [_Remote_].
* If the Attack had an _Area_, resolve it in an equivalent number of contiguous spaces within the Thundercloud (maximum 7).
* Any _Hazard_ created by an Attack originating from the Thunderstorm moves with it.
* You may choose to end this _Enchant_ as a part of making an Attack from it. If you do, gain _Advantage_ on the Attack.

Any creatures in the Thundercloud at the end of the _Round_ take 2 _Lighting_ Damage and gain _Shocked_ 1.
special: At the end of each _Phase_ you may move the Thundercloud 1 space in any direction.
boost: 1 _Momentum_ (paid at the end of any _Phase_): Deal 2 _Lightning_ Damage within the _Area_ of the Thundercloud. Add [_Pierce_ 1] against _Shocked_ targets.

name: Trampling Charge
desc: You run forward, slamming through all foes in your path.
effect:
Choose one:
* You have +1 _Guard_ this _Turn_. Resolve your _Movement_. When you end your _Movement_, make a single _Melee_ _Major Attack_. If the target of the Attack is in-line with your _Movement_, either inflict _Forceful_ _Push_ X or inflict X additional _Bonus Damage_, where X is half the number of spaces you Moved before resolving the effect.
* Do not resolve your _Movement_ yet. Create a _Hazard_ in an adjacent space, become _Charging_, then end your _Turn_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove _Charging_ and resolve the first effect, but you must move through the space marked by the _Hazard_, removing the _Hazard_ when you do so. You have _Advantage_ on all [_Body_] Attacks and may choose both options for your _Major Attack_ at the end of the _Movement_. If you are moved by any means before removing _Charging_, move the _Hazard_ with you.
special: _Overrun_ costs only 1 _Momentum_ when resolving the effect.

name: Whirling Wind
desc: You create a vortex of wind, catching all in its path and sending it spiraling across the battlefield.
boost: 2 _Momentum_ (paid at the end of any _Phase_): A creature of your choice within the Whirlwind automatically _Negates_ and resolves the normal _Slide_ effect. You may choose to add [_Forceful_] or treat the creature as if they _Fell_ 3 spaces less.
special: If you already have an active Whirlwind, instead use _Swirling Vortex_ on all creatures within it.

name: Wind Tunnel
desc: You create a continuous tunnel of wind, accelerating your allies while carving the battlefield in half.
effect: Make all spaces in the _Area_ _Gusting_. The direction of _Gusting_ spaces in each Line must be continuous and match the other Lines. While these _Gusting_ spaces persist an ally that enters the area or starts their _Turn_ in it may move to the end, treating this Movement as [_Safe_] and expending only half the normal _Movement_. They may only benefit from this once on a given _Turn_.
special: You may add [_Enchant_]. If you do, remove _Fleeting_ from these _Gusting_ spaces, and instead remove them when the _Enchant_ ends.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Increase the length of the _Area_ by 2. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice.
